hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"A city-dweller should not sell for a Bedouin. Leave people to (engage in trade) and Allah will grant them provision through one another

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يَبِيعَ حَاضِرٌ لِبَادٍ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of A City-Dweller Selling On Behalf Of A Bedouin
